response.overview: Victoria Jane is on the phone with a friend talking about the creepy guy Justin Hunt at school who made her feel uncomfortable when he showed up at the massage parlor. He responds by blackmailing her, saying it would be a shame if anyone at school found out that she works there. Having no room to move, she asks him what he wants. he simply wants a massage. When Logan Long walks into the massage parlor, Whitney Wright freaks out. When he realizes who she is, he exclaims that he had a huge crush on her back in the day and is super stoked that she's the one who's going to service him. Alex Harper is getting ready for her next client when this one shows up. There is none other than Derrick Pierce, her boyfriend's best friend. Being uncomfortable, he offers to postpone the appointment, but Alex tells him that it is only a massage, strictly professional and that her boyfriend will never be informed.
response.title: My School Crush
